Rank 1 Effect: You are insulated against hypothermia. However, your maximum AP decreases by 1 to a minimum of 6.
Rank 2 Effect: Your AP is no longer decreased and you remain insulated. However, this upgrade costs 800 caps instead of 100.

Rank 1 Effect: You gain advantage on sneak checks relying on sight. Your passive sneak increases by 3.
Rank 2 Effect: You gain advantage on sneak checks relying on sound. Your passive sneak increases by 3.
Rank 3 Effect: While in dim light, you become shadowed. Your passive sneak increases by 3.

Rank 1 Effect: Load reduced by 5. Strength req. reduced by 1. DT reduced by 1.
Rank 3 Effect: If you spend at least 4 AP on your turn to move, you can move an additional 10 feet.

Rank 1 Effect: When you take damage from an area of effect, your DT is doubled.
Rank 2 Effect: Your maximum stamina points increase by a number equal to your level.
Rank 3 Effect: You have advantage on combat sequence rolls. If you already have advantage, you gain a +5.

Rank 1 Effect: When you take damage from a critical hit, your DT increases by 3.
Rank 2 Effect: When you take damage from a critical hit, your DT increases by 5.
Rank 3 Effect: If you would gain a severe injury, you instead gain a random limb condition.

Rank 1 Effect: You ignore the negative effects of the first 2 levels of decay for the armor.
Rank 2 Effect: You ignore the negative effects of the first 4 levels of decay for the armor.
Rank 3 Effect: Your armor no longer decays from being damaged by a critical hit.

Rank 1 Effect: Your carry load is increased by 10.
Rank 2 Effect: Your carry load is increased by 15.
Rank 3 Effect: Your carry load is increased by 25.
